description: Restriction on entry into free circulation

measure_type.en: Restriction on entry into free circulation
measure_type.cy: Cyfyngiad ar fynediad i gylchrediad rhydd

sub_text.en: You will need to do the following for your goods to circulate freely:
sub_text.cy: Bydd angen i chi wneud y canlynol er mwyn i'ch nwyddau gylchredeg yn rhydd:
